Class NewGameController

java.lang.Object
Presentation.Controller.Subcontrollers.NewGameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class NewGameController extends Object implements ActionListener
Used to determine the logic required to perform the user choice in the newGame View
